name: Multi Channel Support Desk with Twilio TaskRouter
description: A Flask app that handles inbound calling and SMS. Uses TaskRouter to coordinate handing off calls and messages to support desk agents.

TWILIO_ACCOUNT_SID.description: Your Twilio account's unique identifier, found here: https://www.twilio.com/user/account

TWILIO_AUTH_TOKEN.description: Your Twilio account's secret key, found here: https://www.twilio.com/user/account

TWILIO_WORKSPACE_SID.description: Workspace SID for workspace you want to use for this support desk, found here: https://www.twilio.com/user/account/taskrouter/workspaces
